revised_title: Electrochemical Decomposition of Earths and Formation of Metals from Alkaline Earths and Ammonia
tldr: Humphry Davy conducts electrochemical research on the decomposition of earths, focusing on alkaline earths and ammonia. He discovers that when these substances are acted upon by a voltaic battery, they can form metallic alloys and decompose water. Davy also successfully repeats an experiment by Berzelius and Pontin, decomposing ammonia into a soft amalgam.
